content: Replace execSync('echo ... > ...') with fs.writeFileSync for writing context files in index.ts.
Import and use node-fetch explicitly for fetch requests in index.ts.
Define a TypeScript type/interface for the generation object in index.ts for better type safety.
Improve error handling and cleanup logic in index.ts to ensure proper directory cleanup even if process.chdir is used.
Add JSDoc comments and inline comments for main functions and complex logic in index.ts.
Check for directory existence before creating a new project directory in index.ts.
Add a check for Node.js version compatibility at the start of index.ts (optional, but recommended for CLI tools).
Add 'files', 'repository', and 'engines' fields to package.json for best publishing practices.
Add a note in README.md acceptance criteria about offline support for default templates.
